The Brazilian government is lifting the public health emergency announced in the country at the start of the COVID-19 pandemic, about two years ago, Health Minister Marcelo Queiroga said.

articles.title: Poster boy of Kerala’s fight against discrimination of HIV-positive patients, found dead at relative's house - Times Now
articles.description: ​According to authorities, Benson was a resident of Kaithakuzhi in Kollam and was the sole survivor of a family of four, all of them were HIV positive. Police officers said that Benson reportedly worked at a private company owned by his relative.
